   10BLACK=0:RED=1:GREEN=2:YELLOW=3:BLUE=4:MAGENTA=5:CYAN=6:WHITE=7
   20MODE2
   30GCOL0,128+GREEN
   40CLG
   50GCOL0,WHITE
   60FOR X=-1200 TO 1280+1200 STEP 100
   70MOVE640,600
   80DRAWX,0
   90NEXT
  100GCOL0,BLACK
  110MOVE0,1024:MOVE0,400:PLOT 85,1280,1280:PLOT85,1280,400
  120LET Y=400
  130GCOL0,WHITE
  140FORA=1 TO 10
  150MOVE0,Y
  160DRAW1280,Y
  170Y=Y-(10000/Y)
  180NEXT A
  190FOR S=1 TO 150
  200GCOL0,RND(7)
  210PLOT69,RND(1280),RND(623)+401
  220NEXT
  230GCOL1,WHITE 
  240PROCcircle(1000,700,60)
  250GCOL0,BLACK
  260PROCcircle(975,680,10)
  261READX,Y:IFX=0 THEN END
  262PLOT69,X,Y
  263GOTO 261
  280DEFPROCcircle(X,Y,R)
  290MOVEX,Y
  300FORI=0TO 360 STEP 15 
  310MOVEX,Y
  320PLOT85,SINRAD(I)*R+X,COSRAD(I)*R+Y
  330NEXT
  340ENDPROC
  350DATA 1002,755,956,735,1055,700,990,715,1020,670,950,699
  360DATA0,0
